title: * Sorsop, Afarano, and Graviola tree, the purest of cancer?
subtitle: Although the chemicals in the fruit showed the properties of potential anti-cancer in the laboratory, there is no evidence to support their use as cancer candy.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Orsop or guanabano, or other components of a plant (A. muricata), is a cancer-friendly cure.
